nodes.text: The Theed plasma refinery was a plasma refinery located on planet Naboo, near the city of Theed. It had been abandoned by around 21 BBY.

Around 21 BBY, during the Clone Wars, Count Dooku and his bounty hunters, who included Obi-Wan Kenobi under the disguise of Rako Hardeen, Cad Bane, Twazzi, Embo, Derrown and mastermind Moralo Eval, launched their plot to kidnap Supreme Chancellor Palpatine during the Festival of Light in Theed. During the action, Embo and Twazzi were arrested, and Derrown was "knocked out". Bane and Eval managed to transform Palpatine into a Senate Guard with the help of a holographic disguise matrix, they put him into their speeder and head to this refinery to meet up Dooku. However, Dooku was not there. Instead, the disguised Kenobi arrived, who started a short fight with Bane and Eval. He managed to defeat the two, which was followed by the arrival of Anakin Skywalker and Jedi Master Mace Windu in their speeders, followed by a squad of clone shock troopers, who arrested Bane and Eval. Palpatine was transformed back and brought back to Theed, where he and Skywalker faced Dooku.
